item.description:
At this regular monthly meeting of the APT, we will find out who filed to run for City Council, School Board, Police Commission, and Fire Commission. We will decide on our election endorsement strategy, and recruit volunteers to help with whatever plan we adopt. We will be in the Hilton Garden Inn Room at the Portsmouth Public Library.

Liberty-minded Portsmouth residents are strongly encouraged to get involved. If meetings aren’t your thing, let me know if you are willing and able to help with election events—interviews, a public forum, preparing mailers, etc. And join the APT—it’s only $10 per family!

This is primarily for Portsmouth residents. Others are welcome, and may possibly find it interesting, but may well be bored.
item.how_to_find_us: The Hilton Garden Inn Room is upstairs, to the left from the top of the stairs.
item.name: Association of Portsmouth Taxpayers meeting
